thread.section_title: Park Central Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very disappointing!!
thread.title_full: Very disappointing!! - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: wineandtravelaholic
title: Very disappointing!!
text: My partner and I visited this hotel for 5 days in march. On arrival the woman on the desk was very rude not welcoming at all had a very stand off attitude. There was nobody there to help assist with the bags to the room. We were meant to be staying in a premier room- it was incredibly basic. There was no mini bar in the room, the air conditioning was useless and the cleanliness was not acceptable for a hotel in the middle of New York rated 4 stars. I went to the concierge one day to ask for advice on the subway the woman barely uttered 2 words at me and handed me a bit of paper with instructions on. There was no restaurant in the hotel either just a very basic grab and go service. I lost my key one night and went to the desk to ask for another the woman on the desk did not try in help in the slightest her words were " no ID no key" overall a very very disappointing hotel we 100% won't be back.
